section.heading: Action for possession of rental unit used as a drug haven.

annoGroup.heading: Emergency Legislation
annoGroup.annotation: For temporary amendment of section, see § 2(b) of the Drug House Abatement Emergency Amendment Act of 1996 (D.C. Act 11-446, December 5, 1996, 43 DCR 6664).

annoGroup.heading: Expiration of Law
annoGroup.text: See Historical and Statutory Notes following § 42-3631.
